DD214 - Sample Document
DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE
DD FORM 214
CERTIFICATE OF RELEASE OR DISCHARGE FROM ACTIVE DUTY

NAME: John Doe
SSN: 123-45-6789
BRANCH OF SERVICE: US Army
DATE OF ENTRY: 2010-01-15
DATE OF SEPARATION: 2014-03-20
CHARACTER OF SERVICE: Honorable

---

C&P Exam - Sample Document
DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS
COMPENSATION & PENSION EXAMINATION REPORT

VETERAN: John Doe
EXAM DATE: 2020-05-15
DIAGNOSIS: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)

HISTORY: Veteran reports experiencing symptoms of PTSD following deployment.

---

MRI Report - Sample Document
RADIOLOGY REPORT
MAGNETIC RESONANCE IMAGING (MRI)

PATIENT: John Doe
EXAM DATE: 2020-06-01
FINDINGS: L4-L5 disc herniation noted

---

Buddy Letter - Sample Document
BUDDY STATEMENT
VA FORM 21-4138

I, Michael Johnson, served with John Doe in Afghanistan. I witnessed John experiencing significant stress and trauma during our deployment.
